title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-2.10 - Policies concerning course cancellation and tuition refund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-2.10 - Policies concerning course cancellation and tuition refund

State Regulations

Any educational institution or other organization
requesting from the Department of State approval for home inspection courses
must have a policy relating to course cancellation and tuition refunds. Such
policy must be provided in writing to prospective students prior to the
acceptance of any fees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
§§
197-2.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
